Description: Green glazed steatite scarab, feathered legs, with loops around inscription, title and name.
Curator's comments: Martin, Egyptian Administrative and Private-Name Seals, no. 1596
Bibliographic references: Martin 1971 / Egyptian administrative and private-name seals, principally of the Middle Kingdom and Second Intermediate Period (1596)
Condition: fair (chip off top edge and glaze patchy)
